languages.text: {n}Идира мнется несколько секунд, явно не решаясь начать, но затем все же негромко отвечает вместо вас.{/n} "Жив он, жив. Видели его в звездной гавани, когда на Райкаде высадились..." {n}Под вашим взглядом она сникает и отворачивается.{/n}

{n}Idira fidgets for a few seconds, hesitant to say anything, but then decides to quietly answer for you,{/n} "He's alive. We saw him at the starport when we landed on Rykad..." {n}Meeting your gaze, she shrinks and turns away.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Идира мнется несколько секунд, явно не решаясь начать, но затем все же негромко отвечает вместо вас.{/n} "Жив он, жив. Видели его в звездной гавани, когда на Райкаде высадились..." {n}Под вашим взглядом она сникает и отворачивается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira fidgets for a while, hesitant to say anything, but then decides to answer in your stead after all and says quietly,{/n} "He's alive. We saw him at the starport when we landed on Minoris..." {n}When she meets your gaze, she shrinks and turns away.{/n}

{n}Idira fidgets for a while, hesitant to say anything, but then decides to answer in your stead after all and says quietly,{/n} "He's alive. We saw him at the starport when we landed on Minoris..." {n}When she meets your gaze, she shrinks and turns away.{/n}

{n}Idira fidgets for a few seconds, hesitant to say anything, but then decides to quietly answer for you,{/n} "He's alive. We saw him at the starport when we landed on Rykad..." {n}Meeting your gaze, she shrinks and turns away.{/n}

{n}Idira fidgets for a few seconds, hesitant to say anything, but then decides to quietly answer for you,{/n} "He's alive. We saw him at the starport when we landed on Rykad..." {n}Meeting your gaze, she shrinks and turns away.{/n}

{n}Idira fidgets for a few seconds, hesitant to say anything, but then decides to quietly answer for you,{/n} "He's alive. We saw him at the starport when we landed on Rykad..." {n}Meeting your gaze, she shrinks and turns away.{/n}

{n}Idira fidgets for a few seconds, hesitant to say anything, but then decides to quietly answer for you,{/n} "He's alive. We saw him at the starport when we landed on Rykad..." {n}Meeting your gaze, she shrinks and turns away.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira hält einige Sekunden nervös inne und zögert, beschließt dann aber, an deiner Stell leise zu antworten:{/n} "Er lebt. Wir haben ihn bei der Landung auf Rykad im Raumhafen gesehen ..." {n}Sie begegnet deinem Blick, sinkt in sich zusammen und wendet sich ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira fidgets for a few seconds, hesitant to say anything, but then decides to quietly answer for you,{/n} "He's alive. We saw him at the starport when we landed on Rykad..." {n}Meeting your gaze, she shrinks and turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira hält einige Sekunden nervös inne und zögert, beschließt dann aber, an deiner Stell leise zu antworten:{/n} "Er lebt. Wir haben ihn bei der Landung auf Rykad im Raumhafen gesehen ..." {n}Sie begegnet deinem Blick, sinkt in sich zusammen und wendet sich ab.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira gigote pendant quelques secondes, hésitant à dire quoi que ce soit, mais décide finalement de répondre tout bas à votre place :{/n} « Il est vivant. On l'a croisé à l'astroport quand on a atterri sur Rykad... » {n}Croisant votre regard, elle se fait toute petite et tourne la tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira fidgets for a few seconds, hesitant to say anything, but then decides to quietly answer for you,{/n} "He's alive. We saw him at the starport when we landed on Rykad..." {n}Meeting your gaze, she shrinks and turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira gigote pendant quelques secondes, hésitant à dire quoi que ce soit, mais décide finalement de répondre tout bas à votre place :{/n} « Il est vivant. On l'a croisé à l'astroport quand on a atterri sur Rykad... » {n}Croisant votre regard, elle se fait toute petite et tourne la tête.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉支吾了几秒，犹豫着要不要说些什么，但到最后，她还是决定替你开口。{/n}“他还活着。我们在莱卡德着陆的时候，在星港见过他一面……”{n}随后，她看到了你的目光，赶紧缩了缩脖子，转过了身。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira fidgets for a few seconds, hesitant to say anything, but then decides to quietly answer for you,{/n} "He's alive. We saw him at the starport when we landed on Rykad..." {n}Meeting your gaze, she shrinks and turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉支吾了几秒，犹豫着要不要说些什么，但到最后，她还是决定替你开口。{/n}“他还活着。我们在莱卡德着陆的时候，在星港见过他一面……”{n}随后，她看到了你的目光，赶紧缩了缩脖子，转过了身。{/n}

languages.text: {n}イディラはそわそわして、何かを言うのをためらっていたが、その後、あなたに代わって静かに答えることにした。{/n}「その人は生きてるわ。ライカドに降りた時、スターポートでその人を見たから…」{n}こちらと視線が合うと、彼女は縮こまってそっぽを向いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira fidgets for a few seconds, hesitant to say anything, but then decides to quietly answer for you,{/n} "He's alive. We saw him at the starport when we landed on Rykad..." {n}Meeting your gaze, she shrinks and turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは言いづらそうにもじもじしていたが、意を決して静かに応えた。{/n}「彼は生きてるわ。ライカドに降りた時、スターポートで彼を見てる…」 {n}視線を合わせると、彼女は縮こまってそっぽを向いた。{/n}
{n}イディラはそわそわして、何かを言うのをためらっていたが、その後、あなたに代わって静かに答えることにした。{/n}「その人は生きてるわ。ライカドに降りた時、スターポートでその人を見たから…」{n}こちらと視線が合うと、彼女は縮こまってそっぽを向いた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira se muestra inquieta por unos segundos, dudando sobre qué decir, pero decide responder por ti en voz baja,{/n} «Está vivo. Lo vimos en el puerto estelar cuando llegamos a Rykad...». {n}Tras cruzar la mirada contigo, se encoge y se da la vuelta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira fidgets for a few seconds, hesitant to say anything, but then decides to quietly answer for you,{/n} "He's alive. We saw him at the starport when we landed on Rykad..." {n}Meeting your gaze, she shrinks and turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se muestra inquieta por unos segundos, dudando sobre qué decir, pero decide responder por ti en voz baja,{/n} «Está vivo. Lo vimos en el puerto estelar cuando llegamos a Rykad...». {n}Tras cruzar la mirada contigo, se encoge y se da la vuelta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İdira, bir şey söylemeye tereddüt ederek birkaç saniye kıpırdandıktan sonra senin yerine sessizce cevaplıyor.{/n} "Yaşıyor. Rykad'a indiğimizde yıldız limanındaydı." {n}Üzerine diktiğin bakışlarını fark edince ürküp çekiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira fidgets for a few seconds, hesitant to say anything, but then decides to quietly answer for you,{/n} "He's alive. We saw him at the starport when we landed on Rykad..." {n}Meeting your gaze, she shrinks and turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, bir şey söylemeye tereddüt ederek birkaç saniye kıpırdandıktan sonra senin yerine sessizce cevaplıyor.{/n} "Yaşıyor. Rykad'a indiğimizde yıldız limanındaydı." {n}Üzerine diktiğin bakışlarını fark edince ürküp çekiliyor.{/n}
